name: social-auth-react
title: Social Authentication (React)
description: Social authentication (OAuth) components for React with Convex Auth. Supports GitHub and Google sign-in with full Convex backend.
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server and get your deployment URL.

2. Set environment variables in the Convex dashboard (Settings > Environment Variables):
   - `AUTH_GITHUB_ID` / `AUTH_GITHUB_SECRET` - GitHub OAuth credentials
   - `AUTH_GOOGLE_ID` / `AUTH_GOOGLE_SECRET` - Google OAuth credentials

3. Configure OAuth callback URLs in each provider's dashboard:
   - GitHub: `https://<your-convex-url>/api/auth/callback/github`
   - Google: `https://<your-convex-url>/api/auth/callback/google`

At least one OAuth provider must be configured for authentication to work.
